yaak.sim.schedule
Class ActionScheduler

java.lang.Object
  yaak.sim.schedule.Action
      yaak.sim.schedule.ActionScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Scheduler
public class ActionScheduler
extends Action
implements Scheduler

ActionScheduler provides basic scheduling services. Use start to start the scheduler.

ActionScheduler provides its own execution protocol. Although, mechanically, the scheduler can be passed to a thread for execution by that thread, the scheduler will throw an exception, terminating the managing thread. Use start to start the scheduler.

Version:
$Id: ActionScheduler.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith

Constructor Detail

ActionScheduler

public ActionScheduler()

Creates a simple scheduler.

ActionScheduler

public ActionScheduler(long interval)

Creates a simple scheduler. If the interval is 2, the scheduler executes actions at ticks 0, 2, 4, and so on.

Parameters:
interval - The step interval.
See Also:
addAction(yaak.sim.schedule.Action, long)
Method Detail

addAction

public void addAction(Action action,
                      long tick)

Adds the action (or actions, in the case of an ActionGroup) for execution at the specified tick. Note: Adding an action replaces any existing action at that tick. To add multiple actions at a specific tick, encapsulate them in an action group and add the group.

Specified by:
addAction in interface Scheduler
Parameters:
action - The action or action group.
tick - The scheduler's tick.

removeAction

public Action removeAction(long tick)

Removes the action (or actions, in the case of an ActionGroup) for execution at the specified tick.

Specified by:
removeAction in interface Scheduler
Parameters:
tick - The scheduler's tick.
Returns:
The action, or null, if no action is found.
